CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT(BookedLab__r.Location__c), 'MingdeBuilding','明德楼', 'BoyaBuilding','伯牙楼', 'HongwenBuilding','弘文楼', 'DaqianBuilding','大千楼', 'GezhiBuilding','格致楼', 'TrainingCenter','培训中心', 'X1stPracticalTrainingBuilding','第一实训楼', 'X2ndPracticalTrainingBuilding','第二实训楼', 'X3rdPracticalTrainingBuilding','第三实训楼', 'X1stPlayground','第一运动场', 'X2ndPlayground','第二运动场', 'X3rdPlayground','第三运动场', 'X4thPlayground','第四运动场', 'X5thPlayground','第五运动场', 'GroundTrackField','田径场', TEXT(BookedLab__r.Location__c) )
CustomField.label: 地点
